steps: ğŸŒ Archive the evidence for free on the Wayback Machine (archive.org) to ensure public preservation and traceability.

ğŸ’¾ Keep organized and secure backups of all evidence, records, and communications, preferably in encrypted cloud storage and also on physical media such as an external hard drive or USB stick.
